Episode 25 Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 1
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
You do not have to state the obvious.
That is a helicopter from the Speedwagon Foundation.
They are looking for a place to land.
Your old friends who are taking care of Mom back in Japan?
Do not tell me we are going for a ride in that helicopter.
As much as I would like to, the crew are not Stand users.
If we were attacked, they would be at risk.
Then why is that helicopter here?
They have brought us a helper.
He has a few personality issues,
so it is taken a while to get him here.
It is impossible for him to come with us on this trip!
There is no way he could be helpful.
If he is a helper, that means he is a Stand user, right?
He is the Stand user whose Stand suggests the card called The Fool.
We are lucky that he is not our enemy.
You would not be able to beat him.
What did you say, you asshole?
You would better watch your mouth.
And what is with the hand?
I am asking which one of you is the Stand user.
No, it is not either of us.
He is in the back seat.
I do not see anyone there.
You say he is there, but where is he?
Is he really short or something?
The helicopter ride was rough, so he is in a really bad mood.
Do not get close to him!
I told you, he is got some personality issues!
And I am asking where the hell he is
Do not tell me this dog is...
He is The Fool Stand's user.
He loves to tear out human hair by the mouthful.
We do not know where he was born.
When even the dog catchers in New York could not get him,
Avdol was able to find and finally capture him.
While he is ripping out hair, he likes to...
You are going to pay for that!
We met an orangutan Stand user off the shore of Singapore, but...
Who the hell do you think you are, you stupid mutt?!
Do not make me cut you in half!
It is like it is turning into sand...
Now it became solid and swallowed up my sword!
Simply put, it is a Stand made of sand.
And the simpler they are, the stronger they are.
I am not sure if I could hit it.
but I am not about to get my hair ripped out, too.
If we did not, we would not have been able to make it here.
His sense of smell is incredible.
It is Iggy's favorite treat, and he will do anything for it.
but he still will not let down his guard for anyone.
At least take the paper off first.
There is no way he could actually help us.
While he is eating the gum, he should be fine.
Let us get the supplies out now.
Here is some food and water for your trip.
There are medical supplies and a change of clothes, too.
Also, a new camera, for taking spirit pictures.
TVs do not work so well for spirit photography.
It will make a nice memory.
But you are already such good friends, Polnareff!
Mr. Joestar, we will be taking our leave now.
There is something I would like to ask you.
but I am afraid she is not doing very well.
Her energy is fading, and her life remains in danger.
According to the doctors from our Speedwagon Foundation,
she will be lucky if she survives for another two weeks.
Also, we have some information for you.
According to the report, two days ago...
gathered in a building that Dio is believed to be hiding in,
and then they all departed together.
We do not know who they are.
The person who reported this was killed,
and the mansion had already been cleared out.
We were unable to locate the nine men and women.
Any further investigation of this matter is impossible for us,
since we are not Stand users.
Any remaining Stand users with Stands that
the only card left is The World.
I had thought that The World would be Dio's Stand, but...
Apparently, Dio's head has not gotten used to its new body yet.
Dio is very proud, so there is no way he would flee from Cairo.
It would appear that he is trying to stop us from reaching Cairo.
There is only two weeks left, and nine of them...
We might end up a little tired.
It noticed the presence of the Great N'doul, eh?
I was almost able to get it.
I guess I need more practice.
The Nile Ue Ue Fly, eh...
It is because of this fly that Joestar and the others
were able to pursue Lord Dio this far...
Mr. Joestar, cannot you do something about this?
Why is that shitty little dog sitting in
the seat while we are stuck in the back?
It is so cramped, my back hurts.
You will have to wait until the flavor from his
Once that happens, I will throw a new piece of gum into
the back so he will go there.
The Speedwagon Foundation helicopter that flew off earlier is down in the sand!
There is no sign that it was attacked.
It is like it just fell to the ground.
It is very likely we will be attacked by the enemy's Stand!
There are marks where he clawed the helicopter's side...
It is coming from the pilot's mouth...
There is even a small fish.
He drowned in the middle of the desert!
Here, get a hold of yourself.
The enemy Stand is inside the canteen!
The Speedwagon Foundation crew was not
part of this fight, but they were still attacked!
Avdol, did you see what kind of Stand it was?
But it is still inside the canteen!
I have not seen it leave.
They mentioned that Dio gathered nine men and women...
Is the attacker one of them, then?
I am looking for it right now.
The enemy's body is not anywhere I can see.
I even looked for something like that stupid mirror The Sun had.
But it seems the enemy is operating from very far away.
Th-The pilot's head was completely sucked into that tiny little canteen.
So if I poke a hole in that thing...
You should just hit it with an Emerald Splash!
Do not try to make someone do something you will not do yourself!
What the hell is wrong with you?!
Well, I say that I do not want to do it, either!
It had already left the canteen, along with the blood!
It is not that the Stand was inside the canteen...
Bring out Chariot and defend yourself!
It is going to get Polnareff, too.
It is coming for you this time!
The enemy can detect sound through vibrations in the ground.
It can move freely around underground,
without being seen, and before we know it,
it can attack us from behind, or through the bottoms of our feet.
And its user is able to remain far away.
They all got onto their vehicle.
He must have realized that I, N'doul, was finding them with sound.
Too bad figuring that out will not do them any good...
We have to get him to a doctor immediately.
But if we move, it will attack.
It left the car before my attack.
It seems that dog is going to be a problem after all.
The tires are in the water!
It must also know that I am only four kilometers to the west.
I will have to take care of the dog first!
No, I will leave the dog alone.
It does not appear that Joestar and the others can control that dog.
If it is just going to sleep, it is harmless.
It cut the front tires in half!
S-So that is what it is trying to do...
He can smell where the enemy's going to attack next.
If we can just find their body,
there is a good chance we can defeat that fearsome Stand!
Iggy the Fool and Geb's N'doul, Part 2
